text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Apex Legends. The build quality of the Refurbished: Acer Predator 17 G9-793-78CM 17.3" Intel Core i7 6th Gen 6700HQ (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop (Manufacturer Recertified) is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 in the Refurbished: Acer Predator 17 G9-793-78CM 17.3" Intel Core i7 6th Gen 6700HQ (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop (Manufacturer Recertified) is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The keyboard is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Refurbished: Acer Predator 17 G9-793-78CM 17.3" Intel Core i7 6th Gen 6700HQ (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop (Manufacturer Recertified)!
